effect.@en: When these creatures are encountered, roll 1D6 Chaos Die. If the result is face ‘1’, ‘2’ or ‘3’, they have three Apprentice Runes inscribed upon their staff. If the result is face ‘4’ or ‘5’, they have two Journeyman Runes inscribed upon their staff. If the result is face ‘6’, they have one Master Rune inscribed upon their staff.
